Class Arguments.Entry<T>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.options.Arguments.Entry<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the argument type for the option
Enclosing class:
Arguments
public static final class Arguments.Entry<T> extends Object
An entry represents a single option given on the command line together with the parameters given in that option invocation, converted to the option's argument type.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static <U> Arguments.Entry<U> create(Option<U> option, @Nullable U value)
      Creates a new entry that represents an option and its associated value.
      Type Parameters:
      U - the type of the value associated with the option
      Parameters:
      option - the option to associate with the entry; must not be null
      value - the value associated with the option; may be null
      Returns:
      a new entry containing the specified option and value

    • getOption

      public Option<T> getOption()
      Get the option that this entry belongs to
      Returns:
      the option

    • getValue

      public @Nullable T getValue()
      Get the parameters given for this invocation of the option.
      Returns:
      list of option parameters, converted to the target type

    • handle

      public void handle()
      Invokes the handler associated with the option and passes the value of the option to it. This method is used to process the option value using the predefined behavior specified by the handler.
